channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pro by Déesse Pro Review: Mostly a Gimmick
item.description: If LED devices are supposed to make skin care easier, this one makes it feel like a chore.

item.title: Virgins Are Reality TV’s Latest Darlings. Their Reasons for Abstaining Are Complicated
item.description: Hulu’s Are You My First? joins a string of reality shows about virgins, as more young people open up about why they’re not hooking up.

item.title: Meta Has Already Won the Smart Glasses Race
item.description: By securing a billion-dollar stake in the world’s largest eyewear maker with a massive retail footprint, Meta is building both a moat and a launchpad,...

item.title: Next set of VC judges locked in for Startup Battlefield 200 at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: The Startup Battlefield 2025 judging panel is getting even stronger. Our first wave of VCs brought serious firepower, and now we’re adding more top in...

item.title: 25 Best Power Banks (2025), I've Tested Countless to Find Them
item.description: Keep your phone, laptop, handheld gaming console, and other electronics running with these travel-friendly power banks.

item.title: LG S95AR Review: A Hassle-Free Dolby Atmos Soundbar
item.description: LG’s top soundbar serves up thrilling surround sound and Dolby Atmos in a singular package.

item.title: Pintarnya raises $16.7M to power jobs and financial services in Indonesia
item.description: The Indonesian startup, now backed by $16.7M in Series A funding, helps workers find full-time and side gigs while offering financial solutions

item.title: Former Meta exec Nick Clegg offers careful criticism of ‘cloyingly conformist’ Silicon Valley
item.description: Meta’s former policy chief Nick Clegg seems to be walking a tightrope as he promotes his upcoming book, “How to Save the Internet.”

item.title: Bluesky blocks service in Mississippi over age assurance law
item.description: In a blog post published on Friday, the company explains that, as a small team, it doesn't have the resources to make the substantial technical change...

item.title: Netflix’s ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ is probably the biggest movie in theaters
item.description: This is Netflix's first time winning the domestic box office.
